chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog, 🐸 bless his webbed feet, croaked nightly, "10 PM! Chirp, chirp! Medicine time, Pip!" Pip the chick, 🐥 usually compliant, was too busy watching bug documentaries.🦟 One night, Pip forgot. The next morning, Pip woke up…green! 🤢 "Ferdinand," Pip chirped weakly, "Did...did I become you?" Ferdinand just winked. 😉
